text: Kaotam Lookprabaht (เก้าแต้ม ลูกพระบาท) is a Thai former Muay Thai fighter. He is now a trainer at Evolve MMA in Singapore. ==Titles and accomplishments== * 2011 Lumpinee Stadium 118 lbs Champion * 2016 Rajadamnern Stadium 122 lbs Champion ==Fight record== {| class="toccolours" style="width:100%;
